metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9633 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Adobe Flash Player Desktop Runtime 32.0.0.371 and earlier, Adobe FlashPlayer for Google Chrome 32.0.0.371 and earlier, and Adobe Flash Player forMicrosoft Edge and Internet Explorer 32.0.0.330 and earlier have an useafter free vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrarycode execution.

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
